title: Fortnite's War with Apple - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.14.20
description:
Riana Manuel from What’s Good Games joins Greg to talk about Day 2 of the Epic/Apple War, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, and WB Montreal's next game! Follow Riana: https://twitter.com/RianaTweetsNow

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:11 - Housekeeping
WE GOT BIG STREAMS on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Friday at 3 pm, Greg is participating in the Apocalypse Games in The Walking Dead: Saints and Sinners. See how long he can survive the undead.
Monday, Kinda Funny Games is doing the first ever stream of Samurai Jack: Battle Through Time! Catch it at 1:30pm PT: http://twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
We’ve partnered with Gamers Vote! https://www.gamers.vote/
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:30 - Epic vs Apple: Day 2, Steve Kovach @ CNBC
00:18:50 - I'm by no means an expert and only read the complaint. - Best Friends Q:Weissmark J.D.
00:23:05 - Do you find it weird that Epic is mobilizing it’s players, most of whom are probably kids, to “fight” for them? - Best Friends Q:Mama This Is Garbage
00:28:20 - Suicide Squad and WB Games Montreal Reveals at DC FanDome
00:33:48 - Assassin’s Creed Valhalla Creative Director Fired, Jason @ Bloomberg
00:37:12 - NPD for July 2020, Jeffy Grubb Grubb @ GamesBeat
00:43:40 - Lazlo Leaves Rockstar, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:46:00 -  QUIP
00:47:30 -  KLARNA
00:49:32 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:40 - Do you think the reason we haven’t heard more about Marvels: Spider-Man Miles Morales is because the team wants to wait until Marvels Avengers is out? - Hot Dub Time Boat
00:53:10 - Squad Up:Liam(PS4) - Muppetlead
00:54:15 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Blessing and Imran
Wednesday: Blessing and Gary Whitta
Thursday: Greg and Blessing
Friday: Greg and Blessing
